Title: The Horseman on the Roof
Writer: Jean Giono (novel), Jean-Paul Rappeneau, Nina Companeez, Jean-Claude Carrière
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Olivier Martinez, Pierre Arditi, François Cluzet
Plot: In 1832, cholera ravages Provence (South of France). After several misadventures, Angelo, young Italian officer hunted by the Austrian secret police, meets Pauline de Theus, a young lady. After a second accidental meeting, both will start the search of Pauline's husband in a chaotic country.
